item.description:
You either remember the Beermuda Triangle meet-ups or you’ve heard the stories! Come see if Beermuda lives up to its reputation.

It’s Providence Craft Beer Week and what better way to celebrate than a little bar-hopping. As usual, we meet at E & O Tap at 289 Knight Street at 6:00. At 7:30, we’ll mosey on over to The Avery at 18 Luongo Memorial Square. Finally, at 9:00 we’ll head to Julians (and, yes, they don’t use an apostrophe) at 318 Broadway. Park once and walk. We’ll make sure everyone gets back to their cars afterwards. (With luck, no cars will be towed this year!)

E & O is promoting Sixpoint Brewery (sixpoint.com), The Avery is showcasing Pretty Things (www.prettythingsbeertoday.com), and Julians is daring us with Firestone Walker (www.firestonebeer.com). Sounds good to me! Julians also has food, and quite good food, too.

So meet us at one, two, or all three.

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Bruce is hosting this one, as he has done annually four times! Look at his picture!
item.name: Beermuda Triangle IV
